items.sentence: Tom was just pretending he didn't understand French.
Tom should be back from Australia a week from today.
I don't think Tom could understand French back then.
Tom knows that Mary and John are no longer together.
Tom smuggled the stolen diamonds out of the country.
Tom used to play basketball, but he doesn't anymore.
Tom told me that he wrote that poem three years ago.
Tom said he didn't know anything about the accident.
Tom has had three different jobs since last October.
It would be a pity if Tom wasn't allowed to do that.
